name: The Most Incredible Garlic Bread
author: lalala71
summary: Buttery bread, spread with garlic, two melted cheeses, zesty spices, drizzled with olive oil, and broiled to a crispy perfection.
ingredients: freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Line a cookie sheet with aluminum foil
Heat 1 tablespoon of the olive oil in a skillet over low heat
Add garlic; cook and stir for a few minutes until fragrant
In a medium bowl, stir together the cream cheese, garlic, oregano, basil, parsley, salt and pepper
Mix in about half of the remaining olive oil until smooth
Spread 1 tablespoon of this mixture onto each slice of bread, and place them on the foil-lined cookie sheet
Sprinkle Parmesan cheese over each slice, then drizzle with remaining olive oil
Broil for 3 to 5 minutes, or until cheese is bubbly and golden brown
Watch VERY carefully, it will brown fast
